description: Installation parameters provided for a ESC Sensor

latitude.description: Latitude in WGS84 coordinates, provided in decimal degrees

longitude.description: Longitude in WGS84 coordinates, provided in decimal degrees

height.description: Height of ESC Sensor antenna, provided in meters. See heightType for interpretation.

heightType.description: The reference for the height parameter. AMSL indicates the height is measured relative to mean sea level. AGL indicates the height is measured relative to local ground level at latitude, longitude.

antennaAzimuth.description: the boresight direction of the horizontal plane of the ESC antenna in degrees with respect to true north

antennaDowntilt.description: the ESC antenna down tilt in degrees

azimuthRadiationPattern.description: an ESC antenna radiation pattern or an effective ESC antenna radiation pattern in any direction in the azimuthal plane, specified at 1 degree increments referenced to the true north

elevationRadiationPattern.description: ESC antenna radiation pattern or an effective ESC antenna radiation pattern in any direction in the elevation plane
